I'd highly recommend "The Right Stuff" for you! This film is a captivating drama about the early days of the U.S. space program, and it features an impressive ensemble cast including Ed Harris, Dennis Quaid, and Sam Shepard. It might not be as ethereal or frightening as some of the other films on your list, but its exploration of human ambition and courage could certainly resonate with you given your interest in ethics.

If you're looking for something a bit more unusual and quirky, "In the Woods" is an intriguing choice as well! This documentary-style film takes us on a tour of an urban forest inhabited by monsters, giving us a unique perspective on life from their point of view.
